page.title: 18Farming
page.content: In 1964 Sheepcote farm was split into 3.Now there are 3 seperate farms- Ringfield,Turners and Sheepcote farm house. Ringfield farm has 60 acres.The farm grows grass and has 50 cattle.They have a small flock of sheep which are to old to be of any use. Turners farm grow market garden crops such as spinich,marrows and rhubarb.The farm is smaller than Ringfield farm.It only has 50 acres.The farm is on green belt land. Sheepcote farmhouse is owned by a record producer.He is very wealthy.He has 6 cars including 2 Rolls Royces.He lives in a 17th century house.He owns a tithered barn of its kind in Kent.
